metadata.name: Love Yourself
metadata.description:
When you live with intention, its easier to love yourself. In life, there will be so much we will come to love, but first intentionally practice - the love for yourself. When you love yourself, you open yourself to possibilities. 

Love Yourself is a series under the collection titled 'Attraction'. It consists of 10 - 1 of 1 paintings.

My intentions for you:

I live in peace, love and harmony with myself and my surroundings all the time. 

I am protected, supported and guided by the divine. 

My closest relationships are healed, complete and are filled with joy, contentment, understanding and love.

Every action, decision, and thought of mine exudes clarity, love and compassion.

I am physically fit to live my life to the fullest. 

I am reflecting good health, enthusiasm and love, inside and out.

I am living, expressing and experiencing love, humility, humbleness and groundedness all the time. 

Every situation in life is sorted easily, quickly and lovingly.
